banner.name: I'm Otar Mamatsashvili
banner.about: Hello and thank you for visiting my portfolio website. Dive into a space that reflects my professional journey, showcases my expertise, and invites you to get in touch if you find my work compelling.

techStack.title: My Tech Stack
techStack.description: Technologies Iâ€™ve been working with recently

details: Learned programming principles and new emerging technologies.
Created several production-ready applications with fluency in modern front-end and back-end frameworks.
Worked under the mentorship of experienced web developers.
Coded using HTML, CSS and JavaScript to create responsive pages and components for the company website.
Worked cooperatively in a team with business people, designers and developers in a deadline-driven environment.

institutions.title: BACHELOR OF ENGINEERING IN INFORMATICS
details: Awarded a diploma with honors, graduating with a final GPA of 3.55.
Important courses covered: Calculus, Data structures and algorithms, HTML/CSS & Javascript, React, Linux, UX/UI, English B2 and C1 levels.

institutions.title: School Graduate
details: Awarded with gold medal for successful graduation.
Earned a laptop in 9th grade for top grades in all subjects.

examples.name: Countries app
examples.description: Application which is showcasing country cards with essential details and expanded views for comprehensive insights. It also lets users search individual country, or filter countries by region. The app includes customizable dark and light themes for user preference.

examples.name: Dictionary web app
examples.description: Dictionary that allows users to look up meanings, examples, opposites, synonyms, and phonetics for English words. It also includes the option to switch between dark and light themes, as well as choose from different application fonts.

examples.name: Todo app
examples.description: The todo list app allows users to add, mark as completed, and delete tasks. It also features filters for viewing completed or active tasks and enables easy reordering through drag-and-drop functionality. Also, the application offers dark and light themes for user preference.
examples.techStack: React, Typescript, Tailwind, React Beautiful DnD, Vite

examples.name: FrontEnd quiz app
examples.description: Application is designed to allow users to select a specific topic related to frontend development, answer 10 targeted questions on the chosen subject, and subsequently view their quiz results. In addition, the app is responsive and features dark and light themes.

examples.name: Multi-step form
examples.description: The multi-step form application guides users through entering personal details, subscription choices, add-ons, and reviewing all information provided. The fully responsive design ensures an optimal experience across devices.
examples.techStack: React, Typescript, Tailwind, Headless UI, Vite

examples.name: URL Shortener
examples.description: The URL shortener landing page enables users to paste a website URL and obtain a shortened link, which redirects to the original website. The application is fully responsive.
examples.techStack: React, JavaScript, Module CSS, Axios, Vite

name.min: Name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.min: Message must contain at least 3 characters.
